content_html:
Nepal is set to play against Bangladesh today in its second group stage match of the ongoing SAFF U-17 Championship 2025 in Sri Lanka. The match will be held at the Colombo Racecourse Stadium and will begin at 7:15 PM Nepal time.

Strong Start in the Tournament
content_text: Nepal is set to play against Bangladesh today in its second group stage match of the ongoing SAFF U-17 Championship 2025 in Sri Lanka. The match will be held at the Colombo Racecourse Stadium and will begin at 7:15 PM Nepal time. Strong Start in the Tournament
summary:
Nepal is set to play against Bangladesh today in its second group stage match of the ongoing SAFF U-17 Championship 2025 in Sri Lanka. The match will be held at the Colombo Racecourse Stadium and will begin at 7:15 PM Nepal time.

Strong Start in the Tournament
title: Nepal Faces Bangladesh in SAFF U-17 Championship
